landingpage.title: Diisty, the digital solution that speeds up distribution for African industrial companies.
landingpage.description: By simplifying order taking, reducing processing times, and streamlining logistics, it enables faster cash collection. The result: less waiting to get paid, more sales, and a significantly shorter cash flow cycle.

features.sectionDescription: Features designed to strengthen collaboration and streamline the management of orders and payments between the central office and its members.

cards.title: B2B Cloud tailored to local realities
cards.description: Give your partners 24/7 access to your product catalog, pricing, payment options, and contractual terms.

cards.title: Frictionless automation
cards.description: Stop wasting time with manual follow-ups. Diisty automatically sends payment reminders via SMS, WhatsApp, and email. It’s like having a sales representative and an account manager integrated into your team, without the cost of hiring.

cards.title: Global and instant view of operations
cards.description: The general manager can visualize all operations in real time: orders, payments, deliveries, and customer interactions. This global view makes it easier to make informed decisions to effectively steer the company.

blocks.title: Grouped order management
blocks.description: Centralize and optimize grouped orders for your members, reducing costs.

blocks.title: Dynamic pricing
blocks.description: Manage multiple pricing grids based on your members' profiles.

blocks.title: Dedicated ordering space for central members
blocks.description: Provide your members with a personalized space to place their orders easily.

cta.description: Discover how our platform simplifies relationship management
cta.title: Revolutionize your purchasing today

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to your questions to make the most of the benefits offered by Diisty.
faq.q1: What is Diisty and how does it work?
faq.a1: Diisty is a cloud-based platform that allows purchasing groups to easily manage their relationships with members. With this online tool, each member has a dedicated space to place orders, track deliveries, and manage payments with ease.
faq.q2: How does Diisty help optimize purchasing for my members?
faq.a2: Diisty centralizes your members’ orders in real time, allowing you to anticipate their needs, negotiate competitive prices, and tailor conditions to each profile, all while reducing costs and optimizing purchasing management.
faq.q3: Can I customize prices and payment terms for my members?
faq.a3: Yes, Diisty allows you to create flexible pricing grids and custom payment plans for each member. You can adapt prices and payment terms according to your members’ profiles.
faq.q4: How does Diisty strengthen collaboration between the central office and its members?
faq.a4: Yes, Diisty allows you to create flexible pricing grids and custom payment plans for each member. You can adapt prices and payment terms according to your members’ profiles.

contact.title: Try the Beta version
contact.description: Please fill in the form below and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message.
contact.error_required: Please fill in all required fields.
contact.description1: Diisty costs 10 times less than an employee… yet accomplishes the work of more than 10 people. Payment reminders, sales tracking, and much more are fully automated — with no administrative burden.
contact.description2: More intuitive than WhatsApp. No technical skills required: we have over-simplified the user experience so that even a newcomer can be up and running in just a few minutes.
contact.description3: Your teams and partners can work, order, and pay wherever they are, without any complex installation.
contact.paragraph: What makes Diisty the most cost-effective and efficient solution on the market

newsletter.title: Get Diisty's latest news

admin.description: Admins have complete control over all platform features. They can manage all settings, users, and configurations.

support.title: Support Agent
support.subtitle: Customer Support Role
support.description: Support agents handle customer inquiries and manage orders. They are primarily focused on assisting clients but do not have access to sensitive financial or configuration data.

accountant.title: Accountant
accountant.subtitle: Financial Management Role
accountant.description: Accountants manage financial records and oversee billing. They have access to financial data, invoices, and reports but cannot manage operational feature.
